mapper.insert: insert into fund_history_position (code, transaction_date, initiation_date, redemption_date, total_principal_amount, total_amount, total_purchase_fee, total_redemption_fee, held_share, held_days, mark) select #{code}, #{transactionDate}, #{initiationDate}, #{redemptionDate}, #{totalPrincipalAmount}, #{totalAmount}, #{totalPurchaseFee}, #{totalRedemptionFee}, #{heldShare}, #{heldDays}, #{mark} from dual where not exists ( select total_principal_amount, total_amount, total_purchase_fee, total_redemption_fee, held_share from fund_history_position where code = #{code} and transaction_date = #{transactionDate} and initiation_date = #{initiationDate} and total_principal_amount = #{totalPrincipalAmount} and total_amount = #{totalAmount} and total_purchase_fee = #{totalPurchaseFee} and total_redemption_fee = #{totalRedemptionFee} and held_share = #{heldShare} )
